heading: Hey there! I'm Peter
body: Hello there! My name is Peter Bloch, and I am a developer originally from Portland, OR.

heading: Oregon State University Class of '22
body: I am a recent graduate from Oregon State University, both Honors College and College of Engineering. I graduated Magna Cum Laude finishing both a major in Applied Computer Science - Robot Intelligence, and a minor in Mathematics.

subsections.heading: Greek Life
subsections.body: During my Sophomore year of college, I joined the Fraternity of Phi Gamma Delta's Kappa Omicron chapter at OSU. There, I was an active brother, scholarship committee member, and even chapter president for the 2021 calendar year.
